summary.p: This bundle (35-3012 palm leaf manuscript) is in telugu script. It contains a collection of 10 Upaniṣad texts of the four Veda-s and the Śārīrakamīmaṃsā of Bādarāyaṇa in Telugu script. In this bundle, the folio numbering starts from 28.

There are four Vedas in Indian Hindu traditions. Each of the four Vedā-s—the Ṛgveda, Yajurveda, Sāmaveda, and Atharvaveda has four parts, Samhitā, Brāhmaṇa, Āranyaka, and Upaniṣad. The first two parts of each Beda describes the karmakāṇḍa, i.e., activities, rituals, ceremonies that when performed lead to enjoyment and power. The other two parts of each Veda describes the jñānakāṇḍa, the pathway to attain Mokṣa or enlightenment. It deals with liberating knowledge and disclaims actions as a means of attaining Mokṣa. The Upaniṣad-s constitute the concluding portions of the Vedas, they are called Vedānta and they serve as the foundational texts in the theological discourses of many Hindu traditions that are also known as Vedānta. The Upaniṣad-s impact later theological and religious expression.
This budle has 10 Upaniṣad-s. The title of those Upaniṣad-s are:

The second text is the Śārīrakamīmaṃsā of Bādarāyaṇa. Śārīrakamīmaṃsā consist of four adhyāyā-s and each of the four adhyāyā-s consists of four pādā-s. The first Chapter is called the Samanvayādhyāya. The second chapter is called Avirodhādhyāya. The third chapter is called Sādhanādhyāya. The last chapter is called Phalādhyāya.

msItem.title: īśāvāsyopaniṣad
msItem.incipit: oṃ namaḥ praṇavārthāya śuddhajñānaikamūrtaye | nirmalāya prasannāya dakṣiṇāmūrtaye namaḥ | oṃ pūrṇamadaḥ pūrṇamidaṃ pūrṇātpūrṇamudacyate | pūrṇasya pūrṇamādāya pūrṇamevāvaśiṣyate | oṃ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ| oṃ īśāvāsyamidaṃ sarvaṃ yatkiṃca jagatyāṃ jagat | tena tyaktena bhuñjīthā mā gṛdhaḥ kasya sviddhanam |
msItem.explicit: agne naya supathā rāye asmānviśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān | yuyodhyasmajjuhurāṇameno bhūyiṣṭhāṃ te nama uktiṃ vidhema | oṃ pūrṇamadaḥ pūrṇamidaṃ pūrṇātpūrṇamudacyate | pūrṇasya pūrṇamādāya pūrṇamevāvaśiṣyate. oṃ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ |

msItem.title: kenopaniṣad
msItem.incipit: oṃ āpyāyantu mamāṅgāni vākprāṇaścakṣuḥ śrotramatho balamindriyāṇi ca | sarvāṇi sarvaṃ brahmopaniṣadaṃ māhaṃ brahma nirākuryāṃ mā mā brahma nirākarodanirākaraṇamastvanirākaraṇaṃ me'stu tadātmani nirate ya upaniṣatsu dharmāste mayi santu te mayi santu | oṃ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ. keneṣitaṃ patati preṣitaṃ manaḥ kena prāṇaḥ prathamaḥ praiti yuktaḥ. keneṣitāṃ vācamimāṃ vadanti cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ka u devā yunakti |
msItem.explicit: yo vā etāmevaṃ vedāpahatyapāpmānamanante svarge loke jyeye pratitiṣṭhati pratitiṣṭhati | iti caturthaḥ khaṇḍaḥ. oṃ āpyāyantu mamāṅgāni vākprāṇaścakṣuḥ śrotramatho balamindriyāṇi ca | sarvāṇi sarvaṃ brahmopaniṣadaṃ māhaṃ brahma nirākuryāṃ mā mā brahma nirākarodanirākaraṇamastvanirākaraṇaṃ me'stu tadātmani nirate ya upaniṣatsu dharmāste mayi santu te mayi santu. oṃ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ |

msItem.title: kaṭhopaṇiśad
msItem.incipit: om saha nāvavatu | saha nau bhuṇaktu | saha vīryam karavāvahai | tejasviṇāvadhītamastu mā vidviśāvahai | om śāṇtiḥ śāṇtiḥ śāṇtiḥ | om uśaṇ ha vai vājaśravasaḥ sarvavedasam dadau. tasya ha ṇaciketā ṇāma putra āsa |
msItem.explicit: mṛtyuproktām ṇaciketotha labdhvā vidyāmetām yogavidhim ca kṛtsṇam om saha nāvavatu | saha nau bhuṇaktu | saha vīryam karavāvahai | tejasviṇāvadhītamastu mā vidviśāvahai| om śāṇtiḥ śāṇtiḥ śāṇtiḥ | om uśaṇ ha vai vājaśravasaḥ sarvavedasam dadau | tasya ha ṇaciketā ṇāma putra āsa | brahmaprāpto virajŏbhūdvimṛtyuraṇyŏpyevam yo vidadhyātmameva | iti dvitīyādhyāye tṛtīyā vallī samāptā. om saha ṇāvavatu | saha ṇau bhuṇaktu | saha vīryam karavāvahai | tejasviṇāvadhītamastu mā vidviśāvahai | om śāṇtiḥ śāṇtiḥ śāṇtiḥ |

msItem.title: praśnopaniṣad
msItem.incipit: oṃ bhadraṃ karṇebhiḥ śṛṇuyāma devā bhadraṃ paśyemāmākṣabhiryajatrāḥ | sthirairaṅgaistuṣṭuvā gam̐ sastanūbhirvyaśema devahitaṃ yadāyuḥ | svasti na indro vṛddhaśravāḥ svasti naḥ pūṣā viśvavedāḥ | svasti nastārkṣyo ariṣṭanemiḥ svasti no bṛhaspatirdadhātu. oṃ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ | oṃ sukeśā ca bhāradvājaḥ śaivyaśca satyakāmaḥ sauryāyaṇī ca gārgyaḥ kauśalyaścāśvalāyano bhārgavo vaidarbhiḥ kabandhī kātyāyanaste haite brahmaparā brahmaniṣṭhāḥ paraṃ brahmānveṣamāṇā eṣa ha vai tatsarvaṃ vakṣyatīti te ha samitpāṇayo bhagavantaṃ pippalādamupasannāḥ |
msItem.explicit: te tamarcayantastvaṃ hi naḥ pitā yo'smākamavidyāyāḥparaṃ pāraṃ tārayasīti| namaḥ paramaṛṣibhyo namaḥ paramaṛṣibhyaḥ | iti ṣaṣṭhaḥ praśnaḥ | oṃ bhadraṃ karṇebhiḥ śṛṇuyāma devā bhadraṃ paśyemāmākṣabhiryajatrāḥ. sthirairaṅgaistuṣṭuvā gam̐ sastanūbhirvyaśema devahitaṃ yadāyuḥ | svasti na indro vṛddhaśravāḥ svasti naḥ pūṣā viśvavedāḥ | svasti nastārkṣyo ariṣṭanemiḥ svasti no bṛhaspatirdadhātu | oṃ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ |

msItem.title: muṇḍakopaniṣad
msItem.incipit: oṃ bhadraṃ karṇebhiḥ śṛṇuyāma devā bhadraṃ paśyemāmākṣabhiryajatrāḥ | sthirairaṅgaistuṣṭuvā gam̐ sastanūbhirvyaśema devahitaṃ yadāyuḥ. svasti na indro vṛddhaśravāḥ svasti naḥ pūṣā viśvavedāḥ | svasti nastārkṣyo ariṣṭanemiḥ svasti no bṛhaspatirdadhātu | oṃ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ | brahmā devānāṃ prathamaḥ saṃbabhūva viśvasya kartā bhuvanasya goptā | sa brahmavidyāṃ sarvavidyāpratiṣṭhāmatharvāya jyeṣṭhaputrāya prāha |
msItem.explicit: tadetatsatyamṛṣiraṅgirāḥ purovāca naitadacīrṇavrato'dhāte | namaḥ paramaṛṣibhyo namaḥ paramaṛṣibhyaḥ | iti tṛtīyamuṇḍake dvitīyaḥ khaṇḍaḥ. oṃ bhadraṃ karṇebhiḥ śṛṇuyāma devā bhadraṃ paśyemāmākṣabhiryajatrāḥ | sthirairaṅgaistuṣṭuvā gam̐ sastanūbhirvyaśema devahitaṃ yadāyuḥ | svasti na indro vṛddhaśravāḥ svasti naḥ pūṣā viśvavedāḥ | svasti nastārkṣyo ariṣṭanemiḥ svasti no bṛhaspatirdadhātu | oṃ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ |

msItem.title: māṇḍūkyopaniṣad
msItem.incipit: oṃ bhadraṃ karṇebhiḥ śṛṇuyāma devā bhadraṃ paśyemāmākṣabhiryajatrāḥ | sthirairaṅgaistuṣṭuvā gam̐ sastanūbhirvyaśema devahitaṃ yadāyuḥ | svasti na indro vṛddhaśravāḥ svasti naḥ pūṣā viśvavedāḥ | svasti nastārkṣyo ariṣṭanemiḥ svasti no bṛhaspatirdadhātu | oṃ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ | omityetadakṣaramidaṃ sarvaṃ tasyopavyākhyānaṃ bhūtaṃ bhavadbhaviṣyaditi sarvamoṅkāraeva| yaccānyatrikālātītaṃ tadapyoṅkāra eva |
msItem.explicit: amātraścaturtho'vyavahāryaḥ prapañcopaśamaḥśivo'dvaita evamoṅkāra ātmaiva saṃviśatyātmanātmānaṃ ya evaṃ veda ya evaṃ veda | oṃ bhadraṃ karṇebhiḥ śṛṇuyāma devā bhadraṃ paśyemāmākṣabhiryajatrāḥ | sthirairaṅgaistuṣṭuvā gam̐ sastanūbhirvyaśema devahitaṃ yadāyuḥ | svasti na indro vṛddhaśravāḥ svasti naḥ pūṣā viśvavedāḥ | svasti nastārkṣyo ariṣṭanemiḥ svasti no bṛhaspatirdadhātu | oṃ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ |

msItem.title: taittirīyopaniṣad
msItem.incipit: oṃ śaṃ no mitraḥ śaṃ varuṇaḥ. śaṃ no bhavatyaryamā | śaṃ na indro bṛhaspatiḥ | śaṃ no viṣṇururukramaḥ| namo brahmaṇe | namaste vāyo | tvameva pratyakṣaṃ brahmāsi | tvāmeva pratyakṣaṃ brahma vadiṣyāmi | ṛtaṃ vadiṣyāmi | satyaṃ vadiṣyāmi | tamnāmavatu | tadvaktāramavatu | avatu mām. avatu vaktāram | oṃ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ| oṃ śīkṣāṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | varṇaḥ svaraḥ | mātrā balam | sāma saṃtānaḥ | ityuktaḥ śīkṣādhyāyaḥ |
msItem.explicit: bhṛgustasmai yato vai viśanti tadvijijñāsasva tatra yo daśānnaṃ prāṇaṃ mano vijñānamiti tadvijñāya taṃ tapasā dvādaśa dvādaśānanda iti saiṣā daśānnaṃ na nindyāt prāṇaḥ śarīramannaṃ na paricakṣītāpo jyotirannaṃ bahu kurvīta pṛthivyāmākāśa ekādaśaikaidaśa | na kaṃcanaikaṣṭirekānnaviṃśatirekānnaviṃśatiḥ | iti bhṛguvallyadhyāyaḥ samāptaḥ | oṃ śaṃ no mitraḥ śaṃ varuṇaḥ| śaṃ no bhavatyaryamā| śaṃ na indro bṛhaspatiḥ| śaṃ no viṣṇururukramaḥ| namo brahmaṇe| namaste vāyo| tvameva pratyakṣaṃ brahmāsi| tvāmeva pratyakṣaṃ brahma vadiṣyāmi| ṛtaṃ vadiṣyāmi| satyaṃ vadiṣyāmi| tamnāmavatu| tadvaktāramavatu| avatu mām| avatu vaktāram| oṃ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ|

msItem.title: bṛhadāraṇyakopaniṣad
msItem.incipit: oṃ yo vai jyeṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca veda jyeṣṭhaśca śreṣṭhaśca svānāṃ bhavati prāṇo vai jyeṣṭhaśca śreṣṭhaśca jyeṣṭhaśca śreṣṭhaśca svānāṃ bhavatyapi ca yaiṣāṃ bubhūṣati ya evaṃ veda |
msItem.explicit: samānamāsāṃjīvīputrātsāṃjīvīputro māṇḍūkāyanermāṇḍūkāyani-rmāṇḍavyānmāṇḍavyaḥ kautsātkautso vātsyādvātsyaḥ kuśreḥ kuśriryajñavacasorājastambāyanādyajñavacā rājastambāyanasturātkāvaṣeyātturaḥ kāvaṣeyaḥ prajāpateḥ prajāpatirbrahmaṇo brahma svayaṃbhu brahmaṇe namaḥ | iti ṣaṣṭho'dhyāyaḥ | oṃ saha nāvavatu | saha nau bhunaktu | saha vīryaṃ karavāvahai | tejasvināvadhītamastu mā vidviṣāvahai | oṃ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ |

msItem.title: aitareyopaniṣad
msItem.incipit: vāṅ me manasi pratiṣṭhitā mano me vāci pratiṣṭhitamāvirāvīrma edhi vedasya na āṇīsthaḥ śrutaṃ me mā prahāsīranenādhītenāhorātrānsaṃdadhāmyṛtaṃ vadiṣyāmi satyaṃ vadiṣyāmi. tanmāmavatu tadvaktāramavatu avatu māmavatu vaktāramavatu vaktāram | oṃ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ | ātmā vā idameka evāgraāsīnnānyatkiṃcana miṣat sa īkṣata lokānnu sṛjā iti | sa imāṃlokānasṛjata |
msItem.explicit: sa etena prajñenātmanāsmāllokādutkrāmyāmuṣmin svarge loke sarvānkāmānāptvā amṛtaḥ samabhavat samabhavat | vāṅ me manasi pratiṣṭhitā mano me vāci pratiṣṭhitamāvirāvīrma edhi vedasya na āṇīsthaḥ śrutaṃ me mā prahāsīranenādhītenāhorātrānsaṃdadhāmyṛtaṃ vadiṣyāmi satyaṃ vadiṣyāmi. tanmāmavatu tadvaktāramavatu avatu māmavatu vaktāramavatu vaktāram | oṃ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ |

msItem.title: śrīrāmapūrvatāpinyupaniṣad
msItem.author: Independent authority
msItem.incipit: oṃ bhadraṃ karṇebhiriti śāntiḥ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ | oṃ cinmaye'smin mahāviṣṇo jāte daśarathe harau. raghoḥ kule'khilaṃ rāti rājate yo mahīsthitaḥ | sarāma iti lokeṣu vidvadbhiḥ prakaṭīkṛtaḥ | rākṣasā yena maraṇaṃ yānti svodrekato'thavā |
msItem.explicit: tadbhaktā ye labdhakāmāśca bhuktvā tathā padaṃ paramaṃ yānti te ca | imā ṛcaḥ sarvakāmārthadāśca ye te paṭhantyamalā yānti mokṣaṃ ye te paṭhantyamalā yānti mokṣamiti | oṃ cinmaye'smin trayodaśa| svabhūrjyotistisraḥ | sītārāmāvekā | jīvavācī ṣaṭ ṣaṣṭiḥ | bhūtādikametādaśa | pañcakhaṇḍeṣu trinavatiḥ |

msItem.title: śārīrakamīmāṃsā
msItem.author: Bādarāyaṇa
msItem.incipit: namaḥ śrutiśiraḥ padmaṣaṇḍamārtāṇḍamūrtaye | bādarāyaṇasaṃjñāya munaye śamaveśmane | athāto brahmajijñāsā | janmādyasya yataḥ | śāstrayonitvāt | tattu samanvayāt | īkṣaternāśabdāt | gauṇaścennātmaśabdāt | tanniṣṭhasya mokṣopadeśāt | heyatvāvacanācca | svāpyayāt | gatisāmānyāt |
msItem.explicit: pratyakṣopadeśāditi cennādhikārikamaṇḍalasthokteḥ | vikāravarti ca tathāhi sthitimāha | darśayataścaivaṃ pratyakṣānumāne | bhogamātrasāmyaliṅgācca | anāvṛttiḥ śabdādanāvṛttiḥ śabdāt | śāstraṃ brahmavicārākhyamadhyāyāstu caturvidhāḥ | samanvayāvirodhau dvau sādhanaṃ ca phalaṃ tathā | dvitīye smṛtitarkābhyāmavirodho'nyaduṣṭatā | bhūtabhoktṛśruterliṅgaśruterapyaviruddhatā | tṛtīye viratistat tvaṃ padārthapariśodhanam | guṇopasaṃhṛtirjñānabahiraṅgādisādhanam | caturthe jīvato muktirutkrāntirgatiruttarā | brahmaprāptibrahmalokāviti padārthasaṃgrahaḥ |
msItem.finalRubric: iti śārīrakamīmāṃsāśāstre caturthādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ | caturthādhyāyaḥ samāptaḥ |
msItem.colophon: oṃ tatsat brahmārpaṇamastu | virodhikṛcchrāvaṇe'hni pūrṇimārkajasaṃyute | togere pustakamidaṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ likhitaṃ mayā |
